course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website owner, MAIT, is an educational institution. While they offer many programming-related courses, their operational success as a business relies on attracting and enrolling students. A 'Sales Course' would directly benefit them by improving their admissions, marketing, and student acquisition strategies to fill vacant seats and increase enrollment.

contacts.name: Prof. (Mrs.) Namita Gupta
contacts.title: Head of Department, Computer Science and Engineering
